dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1976
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An anniversary recollection in honor of Peter Maurin. Notes writers who influenced Peter and highlights some of his key ideas. Also reflects on adversity, beauty, martyrs, and joy.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 569 1976-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
